snippet: Because of conference realignment, some schedules have been held up. Hotels and other facilities are waiting to book football weekends, leaving fall brides in a holding pattern.
abstract: Uncertainty over realignment of college football conferences is having an unexpected impact on many people who are trying to plan a fall event; couples hoping for a fall weekend wedding are left in a holding pattern because hotels and event facilities in college towns want to give preference to football weekends, and schedules in two major conferences are still up in the air.
lead_paragraph: Because of conference realignment, some schedules have been held up. Hotels and other facilities are waiting to book football weekends, leaving fall brides in a holding pattern.

headline.seo: College Football Schedules Holding Up Wedding Plans
headline.main: When College Football and Wedding Plans Collide
headline.print_headline: When College Football and Wedding Plans Collide
